Dynamic Content
Limetree Park Office
Print
Limetree Park Office
Address:
244 Limetree Park Drive
Bonita Springs, FL 34135
Phone:
239-947-0880
Fax:
239-498-4774
Email:
limetreepark@comcast.net
Website:
limetreepark.org
Notes:
Please note, our office hours during season are Mon thru Fri 9 AM until noon.  Off-Season the office is open Mon, Wed, and Friday 9 AM until noon.  Our Park Manager is in the office Mon, Wed, and Friday's.
Guardian Property Management Office
Contact:
Ernesto Boza, Park Manager
Phone:
239-514-7432
Notes:
This number is monitored, 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year and is ONLY to be used in an EMERGENCY if the LIMETREE PARK OFFICE IS CLOSED
Limetree Park (Payment info)
Contact:
C/o Guardian Property Mgmt
Address:
P. O. Box 20286
Tampa, FL 33622-0286
Notes:
This is the address to mail your Quarterly Condo Association and assessment fees to…..minus the words
(payment info)
Please note, as of April 1, 2024, the office is no longer accepting payments. Thank you

Dynamic Content
About Us
Limetree Park Condominium Inc
Located on Tamiami Trail (US41) in Bonita Springs, Florida.
Limetree Park
is an active, deed-restricted, gated, manufactured home community and offers affordable seasonal living in a quiet, established atmosphere.
With 240 individually owned units and a compliment of common facilities spread over seventeen well maintained acres,
Limetree Park
caters exclusively to the age 55 plus resident.
Limetree Park
is designed as a recreational park and many homeowners are seasonal residents.
Limetree Park
owners elect a Board of Directors to govern the park while many of the day to day operations are delegated to the Park Manager.  The park finances are sound, reserves are well funded and no debt.  Quarterly maintenance fees are maintained at a responsible level.
The manufactured homes of
Limetree Park
are land-owned homesteads.  Some home-sites are empty lots, used strictly for seasonal self-contained RVs. Homes in
Limetree Park
vary in price depending upon the age of the home, the location of the home in the park, the number of bedrooms, bathrooms and other factors.  A few allow small pets.
For information on Sales and Rentals please contact the home owner directly.
OPEN HOUSE POLICY
The front gate will be open from 1 - 4 PM, the second Sunday of each month, January, February, March and April.
Our owners are responsible for advertising and/or having their lot or unit open.
Open House sign may be posted at the lot from 11:30 to 4:30 on open house days.
